base.name: RigidBody
base.description: Models rigid body motion with 3 translational degress of freedom, and optionally 3 rotational degrees of freedom.

parameter_definitions.name: enable_external_mass
parameter_definitions.description: Source for the value used as the mass of the body. True=from inport, False=from the mass parameter.

parameter_definitions.name: enable_rotational_DoFs
parameter_definitions.description: User selection for enabling the rotational degrees of freedom.

parameter_definitions.name: enable_external_inertia_matrix
parameter_definitions.description: Source for the value used as the inertia matrix of the body. True=from inport, False=from the inertia matrix parameter.

parameter_definitions.name: Wx0
parameter_definitions.description: Initial rotational velocity about the X axis.

parameter_definitions.name: Wy0
parameter_definitions.description: Initial rotational velocity about the Y axis.

parameter_definitions.name: Wz0
parameter_definitions.description: Initial rotational velocity about the Z axis.

parameter_definitions.name: ThetaX0
parameter_definitions.description: Initial angle about the X axis.

parameter_definitions.name: ThetaY0
parameter_definitions.description: Initial angle about the Y axis.

parameter_definitions.name: ThetaZ0
parameter_definitions.description: Initial angle about the Z axis.

parameter_definitions.name: enable_output_state_derivatives
parameter_definitions.description: User selection for enabling the output port for the blocks state derivatives as a vector.
